title: Quarkus, a Kubernetes Native Java Framework
body: Red Hat has released #Quarkus, a #Kubernetes native #Java framework tailored for GraalVM and OpenJDK HotSpot.

title: Java 11 Released
body: #Java 11 has arrived. The new release is the first planned appearance of #Oracle's #LTS releases, although #Oracle has also grandfathered in Java 8 as an LTS release to help bridge the gap between the old release model and the new approach.
